login_placeholder: Enter your credentials to login to your account
username_must_be: Username must be at least 4 characters
password_must_be: Password must be at least 4 characters
password_min: Password must be at least 6 characters
password_alphanumeric: Password must contain letters and numbers
welcome_description: Production-ready React boilerplate with everything you need. Stop configuring, start coding.
feature_modern_stack_desc: Next.js 14, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui, React Query, Zustand, and more - all pre-configured and ready to use.
feature_dev_tools_desc: ESLint, Prettier, Husky, Commitlint, and VSCode settings. Includes pre-commit hooks and automated formatting.
feature_prod_ready_desc: SEO optimization, error boundaries, logging, testing setup with Vitest and Testing Library, and CI/CD with GitHub Actions.
join_community_desc: Get updates about new features, templates, and developer tools.
footer_text: MIT Licensed. Open-source and free forever.
